desc: Jim Taylor custom saddles are absolutely top quality with great care and detail from the basic materials to all handmade features of a 'bench made' saddle.

layout.text: Jim Taylor Custom Saddles Online Store

Check out the saddles we have in stock now and our tack. Visit our main website to discover how you can get your own custom saddle.
For Customer Service enquiries call us at 1-800-665-4830
